Text:
If you have the Toast 4.2 or Toast 4.3 patches then please try to post them here as hqx in a comment or post a link.

Technical support at Adaptec says that they lost these files when their old FTP server was retired, and technical support at Roxio says that they never got these files because Toast 4 was already abandoned when they were spun out.
Thank you very much. I really needed this for my iMac. My regards
